DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate non-inferiority product Dalap Duo® compare Epiduo® medicine treat acne . Half participant receive Dalap Duo® , half receive Epiduo® .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Phase III Assess Non-inferiority Dalap Duo® Product Compared Epiduo® Treatment Acne Vulgaris
